author: jvanzyl
msg: - added Runtime.setProperties(propertiesFile) so that turbine can
simply set a default properties file then override a couple
of entries. so the velocity service no longer has to explicity
and these methods can now be made private inside the velocity runtime

author: jvanzyl
msg: - updated the runtime to allow the setting of template stream source
properties via a common name mechanism.

author: jvanzyl
msg: - updated texen to work with the new velocity loading mechanism.
